AltName.entry: ST BARTHOLOMEWS CHURCH CENTRE MENTAL HEALTH CONTACT GROUP (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A project that provides social interaction and a range of activities for people with mental health problems where individual and group support is available. People are encouraged to get involved with planning activities and running the group, which is open to people with long-term mental health problems, people who are depressed and people who are on their own and isolated. Professional support is available if needed. The project is staffed by a Development Worker who is supported by Community Mental Health Nurses, workers and volunteers. Holds regular weekly activities, including outings and a Christmas party. Runs two trips a year. Self or any referral.
